= Introduction =
This should walk you through the basics of getting and compiling the source code.

= 1. Prerequisites =

In order to compile bgda-explorer you'll need to 

 * [http://www.microsoft.com/visualstudio/eng/downloads Visual Studio 2012]
 * [http://tortoisesvn.tigris.org/ TortoiseSVN] ^*recommended svn client^

= 2. Checking Out Source Code =
This will be using TortiseSVN, if you're using a different SVN client your steps may be different.

 # Create a folder where the source code will be downloaded to.
 # Right click the folder and select Svn Checkout.
 # A window will open and enter the following URL into the top text box:
{{{
https://bgda-explorer.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/
}}}

= 3. Compiling the Source Code and Running the Application =

 # Once the download is complete, open the "WorldExplorer.sln" file which is located in the WorldExplorer folder with Visual Studio.
 # Click the debug button on the toolbar which will start the compile process and launch the application once completed.
